headline: Assessing Leidos After Its Strong 2025 Run and New Long Term Defense Contracts
summary: Wondering if Leidos Holdings is still a smart buy after its strong run, or if most of the upside is already priced in? This breakdown is designed to help you decide with confidence. The stock has cooled off recently, slipping about 4.9% over the last week and 4.2% over the past month. It is still up 26.4% year to date and roughly 27.8% over the last year, with multi year gains of 79.3% over 3 years and 85.5% over 5 years. Recent headlines have focused on Leidos expanding its footprint in...
